nodes.text: Trigo Shane was a Human male scoundrel who lived during the renewed conflict between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire.

During the Battle of Corellia, Trigo found himself hired as a consultant to Republic forced in the Government District of the Coronet City. Despite the protests of Captain Bathens, Trigo asked a Republic hero to grab Imperial weapons off of the vanguard fighters and destroy the Imperial hangar.
